title: Distribution of Net Proceeds of Taxes and Duties from Centre to the States in FY2024-2025
comments: All that money to MP and it still has nothing to show for it. Fucking disgrace. It isn't even suffering from over population or anything like say UP, Bihar, WB. There's hardly any political instability. What is wrong with that state. Almost always on top of the worst socio-economic indicators of this country.

I would suggest you go through state factsheets of MP of NFHS 4 and NFHS 5. And 6 is underway too. The results are improving at far higher percentage than most other regions. 

What is wrong? Geographical and Logistical Challenges.
MP still has a very high tribal population which is migrating.
